      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21307685">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21307685">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21307685">
          <div class="bi_video">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Find Background Information on a Topic
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_7" id="content21249436">
          <div id="boxatt21249436" class="boxatt">
           <div class="embedclass">
            <img src="http://corp.credoreference.com/images/logos/Credo-Black-landscape-%20147x50.png" alt="Credo Logo" />
            <form action="javascript:void;" onsubmit="javascript:return credoMultiSearchBasic(document.forms.credoMultiSearchFormBasic);" method="GET" name="credoMultiSearchFormBasic">
             <input type="hidden" name="ubasic" value="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com/search/advanced/?include={0}&amp;headingsOnly=false&amp;sort=relevance" />
             <label for="qbasic">
              Search
             </label>
             <input type="text" id="qbasic" value="" size="15" />
             <input type="image" border="0" name="Submit" value="search" src="http://literati.credoreference.com/images/tools/go_button.png" alt="Submit Button" width="54" height="31" style="top:10px; position:relative;" />
             <br />
             <script type="text/javascript">
              function credoMultiSearchBasic(f){if(f.qbasic.value=='Search for...'||f.qbasic.value==''){alert('Please enter a search.');}else{var qbasic=escape(f.qbasic.value);var ubasic=f.ubasic.value.replace("{0}",qbasic);window.open(ubasic,"_blank");}return false;}
             </script>
            </form>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10177298">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10177298">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10177298">
          <div class="bi_search">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search Google Scholar for Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_20" id="content10177298">
          <div id="boxatt10177298" class="boxatt">
           <label for="searchText10177298">
            <img alt="Google Scholar Logo" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/google_scholar.jpg" />
           </label>
           <br />
           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10177298" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />
           <br />
           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10177298').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10132848">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10132848">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10132848">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10132848">
          <div id="boxatt10132848" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12325164">
              <a id="link_12325164" href="https://scifinder.cas.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12325164,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12325164}); ">
               SciFinder
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database and research tool including literature from many scientific disciplines, specifically in chemistry, engineering, and materials science. **Patrons must register
               <a href="https://origin-scifinder.cas.org/registration/index.html?corpKey=EAED9FB1-86F3-50AB-4A5D-9970D02A6395">
                here
               </a>
               and are required to have a muhlenberg e-mail address to use this database.**
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12325172">
              <a id="link_12325172" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://pubs.acs.org/action/showPublications?display=journals" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12325172,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12325172}); ">
               American Chemical Society Web Editions
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Abstracts and some full-text of peer-reviewed research journals in the chemical and related sciences
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12378286">
              <a id="link_12378286" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.sciencedirect.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12378286,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12378286}); ">
               ScienceDirect College Edition Health and Life Sciences, Physical Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of 1000+ full-text Elsevier journals in the areas of health, life, and physical sciences
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12378293">
              <a id="link_12378293" href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sites/entrez?db=PubMed" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12378293,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286450}); ">
               PubMed
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A service of the National Library of Medicine, PubMed includes over 19 million citations for biomedical articles back to 1948 and links to many sites providing full text articles and other related resources.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12378307">
              Chemical Abstracts
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Located on the B level of the library (540.05), Chemical Abstracts are a print index of scientific literature, technical papers, and patent literature in the fields of chemistry or chemical engineering.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12378339">
              <a id="link_12378339" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12378339,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286581}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12378342">
              <a id="link_12378342" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12378342,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12378342}); ">
               Omnifile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database with some full text articles covering various academic subjects including general sciences, humanities, social sciences, and business.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12378363">
              <a id="link_12378363" href="http://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12378363,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12378363}); ">
               PubChem
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Chemical structures database focused on small organic molecules and their biological activities
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10177129">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10177129">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10177129">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           News Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10177129">
          <div id="boxatt10177129" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12378333">
              <a id="link_12378333" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://pubs.acs.org/cen/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12378333,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12378333}); ">
               Chemical and Engineering News
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "News edition" of the American Chemical Society
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12378334">
              <a id="link_12378334" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12378334,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286621}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12378335">
              <a id="link_12378335" href="http://www.sciencedaily.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12378335,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286628}); ">
               Science Daily
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               News articles, videos, and images in the subjects of health, math, and the sciences.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10177181">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10177181">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10177181">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Access to Books and Other Print Items
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10177181">
          <div id="boxatt10177181" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24673344">
              <a id="link_24673344" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/discovery" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24673344,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24673344}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To find only books, use the Book limit box on the left sidebar of your search results page. You can also limit to Muhlenberg College or search books in Libraries worldwide.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12378397">
              <a id="link_12378397" href="http://www.google.com/books" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12378397,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12378397}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search for books indexed and scanned by the Google books project.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10177243">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10177243">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10177243">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Other Items of Interest
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10177243">
          <div id="boxatt10177243" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12378411">
              <a id="link_12378411" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12378411,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12378411}); ">
               Interlibrary Loan
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Interlibrary Loan Office service provides access to materials not owned by Muhlenberg College. Interlibrary loan service supports the study and research needs of Muhlenberg College students, faculty, staff, alumni/ae, and some affiliates.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12378416">
              <a id="link_12378416" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12378416,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12324431}); ">
               Ulrich's Web
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Ulrich's Directory is a database that provides bibliographic information, including if a journal is refereed or not (refereed is another word for peer-reviewed) on international periodicals.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
